name: Employee
comment: Contains all the details of an user or an employee who is working with the service provider.
vf short description: Contains all the details of an user or an employee who is working with the service provider.

fields.name: EmployeeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: EmployeeKey
fields.comment: Identifies the employee in ALDM.

fields.name: FirstName
fields.comment: Specifies the employees first name.

fields.name: LastName
fields.comment: Specifies the employees last name.

fields.name: SalesChannelSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SupervisorFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether the employee is an acting supervisor.

fields.name: EmailAddress
fields.comment: Specifies the employees email Id.

fields.name: LaborRate
fields.comment: Specifies the employees hourly labor rate.

fields.name: FaxNumber
fields.comment: Specifies the employees fax number that includes the area code, fax number and the extension.

fields.name: LocalLogin
fields.comment: Specifies the host login name of the employee. The host login name is used in the case dial site form for remote dialups.

fields.name: InternalCompanyMail
fields.comment: Specifies the employees internal company email Id.

fields.name: PhoneNumber
fields.comment: Specifies the employees primary phone number that includes the area code, phone number and the extension.

fields.name: AdditionalPhoneNumber
fields.comment: Specifies the employees additional phone number that includes the area code, phone number and the extension.

fields.name: EmployeeDealerStartDate
fields.comment: Indicates the start date of employee.

fields.name: EmployeeDealerEndDate
fields.comment: Specifies the end date of the employee.

fields.name: EmployeeTitle
fields.comment: Specifies the professional title of the employee.

fields.name: EmployeeWorkgroupStartDate
fields.comment: Specifies the date on which the employee has started working with the current work group.

fields.name: EmployeeNumber
fields.comment: Specifies the employee Id number.

fields.name: BlacklistDate
fields.comment: Specifies the date on which the user was blacklisted.

fields.name: BlacklistInd
fields.comment: Indicates whether the employee is blacklisted.

fields.name: BlacklistReasonDesc
fields.comment: Free text entered as the employee blacklist reason.

fields.name: BlacklistedById
fields.comment: Specifies the Id of the agent who blacklisted the employee.

fields.name: UserLoginName
fields.comment: Indicates the user login name.

fields.name: SupervisorSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: UserSourceId
fields.comment: Internal record number for the User table in the Amdocs CRM database.

fields.name: OperatorId
fields.comment: Indicates the operator id for the Secure User.

fields.name: UserStatusInd
fields.comment: Indicates the status of the user. The values are:0=inactive1=active

fields.name: WorkGroupDesc
fields.comment: Indicates the work group to which an employee belongs. For example, Call Administrator, Product Specialist, SSE, Logistics, Quality Engineer, and Administration.

fields.name: DealerSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: UserLockedFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether the user is locked. This is only relevant for entries from the SEC_USER table.

fields.name: UserDisabledFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether the user is disabled. This is only relevant for entries from the SEC_USER table.

fields.name: UserActiveFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether the user is active. This is only relevant for entries from the SEC_USER table.

fields.name: EmployeeSourceInd
fields.comment: Indicates the source of employee data. The options are:1. TABLE_EMPLOYEE EMP 2. TABLE_USER USR 3. SEC_USER SECUSR

fields.name: EmployeeSourceId
fields.comment: Internal record number for the Employee table in the Amdocs CRM database.

fields.name: EmployeeRole
fields.comment: Defines role of the employee in sales hierarchy (Sales Manager, Sales Person and so on)Note : solution assumes that one employee can have one manager only, and the role of the employee is always the same

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
